history: TTS <speak> Welcome to CMU GetGoing <break time='1s' />.
TTS <speak> Do you need parking information around UPMC Presby campus?
USER yes no no no no no
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> </speak>
TTS Where do you want to park? I can provide parking information at UPMC Presby, UPMC Montefiore, Kaufmann medical building, or Falk Clinic.
USER press B
TTS <speak> Sorry I can't find parking information around minuteman press , please call the parking operations at (412)647-3194. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS <speak> Are you looking for a doctor's office?
USER yes
TTS <speak> Great! <break strength='strong' /> I will help you to find a doctor's office. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS What is the doctor's full name?
USER Susan Greenspan

TTS <speak> I found susan greenspan's office to be <break strength='strong' /> Suite 4E at <break strength='weak'/> Benedum Geriatric, with <break strength='weak'/> Center Endocrinology specialty. Phone number <break strength='weak'/> (412)692-2472. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS <speak> I can also help with trip planning. <break strength='strong'/> Do you want public transit directions or driving directions
USER how do bye

TTS <speak> I found susan greenspan's office to be <break strength='strong' /> Suite 4E at <break strength='weak'/> Benedum Geriatric, with <break strength='weak'/> Center Endocrinology specialty. Phone number <break strength='weak'/> (412)692-2472. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS <speak> I can also help with trip planning. <break strength='strong'/> Do you want public transit directions or driving directions
USER how do I get to her office
TTS <speak> I can also help with trip planning. <break strength='strong'/> Do you want public transit directions or driving directions
USER driving directions
TTS <speak> No problem. <break strength='strong' /> I will give you driving directions to your destination. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Okay, going to pittsburgh city law department. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where would you like to leave from?
USER I'm going to UPMC Presbyterian Hospital
TTS Okay, going to upmc presbyterian. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where are you leaving from?
USER Beechwood and fifth
TTS Okay, leaving from fifth avenue and beechwood blvd. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When do you want to travel
USER I'd like to travel now
TTS Okay, travelling at 02:26 pm.
TTS <speak> Would you like me to pause after every step to give you time to write things down? </speak>
USER no
TTS <speak> Sounds good. <break strength='strong' /> Let me know if you didn't understand a step, and I'll repeat it for you. </speak>
TTS <speak> Just a minute. Let me look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> There are 2 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 10 minutes. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Did you understand this step? </speak>
USER yes
TTS <speak><break time='800ms'/> The first thing that you want to do <break strength='weak'/> is to Head west on Fifth avenue. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Are you ready for the next step? </speak>
USER yes
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Continue straight to stay on Fifth avenue. Pass by Starbucks . . </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Did you understand this step? </speak>
USER yes I did
TTS <speak> Next, <break strength='weak'/> you should Turn right onto Lothrop Street </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Are you ready for the next step? </speak>
USER yes I am
TTS <speak> The final step <break strength='weak'/> is to Turn right at Victoria Street Destination will be on the left. </speak>
TTS <speak> <break time='800ms'/> Shall I move onto the next step? </speak>
USER yes please
TTS <speak> </speak>
TTS <speak> Would you like to hear an alternate route?</speak>
USER no
TTS Thank you for using CMU Get Going. If you would like to plan another trip, say <break strength='weak' /> RESTART.
USER thank you
